Tutorial for noobs:
1. Add the folder names "Content" to the root of a DVD
2. Name the disc "Just Cause 2" (NOT necessary)
3. Burn the Disc
4. Power ON the 360 and eject the disc tray
5. Insert the Disc into your 360
6. Close the disc tray ;)
7. You WILL see Mixed Media Disc (dont worry)
8. Go to "Game Library"
9. Hit "A" at your 360 controller ;)
10. Whooow, you see "Just Cause 2 Demo"
11. Hit "A" twice to start the game.
12. Play Just Cause 2 Demo
13. Power OFF your computer to save Power.
14. ENJOY the game without using a DL disc ;)
15. If you dont get it right with this tutorial, DONT ask me for help!!!
